HivNewInfectionsPeople.name: New HIV infections
HivNewInfectionsPeople.description: Number of people newly infected with HIV/AIDS
nlSentences: New HIV infections is defined as the number of people who have been newly infected with HIV (human immunodeficiency virus) in a given year.

HivNewInfectionsMalePeople.name: New HIV infections - male
HivNewInfectionsMalePeople.description: New HIV infections for males in a given year (number of people)
nlSentences: New male HIV infections is defined as the number of men who have been newly infected with HIV (human immunodeficiency virus) in a given year.
Number of new (previously uninfected) men infected with HIV/AIDS.

HivNewInfectionsFemalePeople.name: New HIV infections - female
HivNewInfectionsFemalePeople.description: New HIV infections - female (number of people)
nlSentences: New female HIV infections is defined as the number of women who have been newly infected with HIV (human immunodeficiency virus) in a given year.
Number of new (previously uninfected) women infected with HIV/AIDS.
